title: A $30 Billion Pension Battle Risks Exodus at Colombian Regulator
description: Colombia’s financial regulator is in turmoil after dozens of officials were asked to resign amid a dispute over whether to force pension funds to repatriate tens of billions of dollars from overseas.
content: Colombia’s financial regulator is in turmoil after dozens of officials were asked to resign amid a dispute over whether to force pension funds to repatriate tens of billions of dollars from overseas.
